passwordResetMailBody:
Dear {0},

We have recieved a password reset request on behalf of you.

If that was not from you, you can safely ignore this mail.

In order to reset your password, you can use the below code:

{2}


Please enter this code in the confirmation code field in the password reset form.

Thank you,
{1}
